userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: Property rights reside with the repository. Literary rights reside with the creators of the documents or their heirs. To obtain permission to publish or reproduce, please contact the Public Services Librarian of the Dept. of Special Collections.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation:
prefercite.p: [Identification of item] Niven Busch's The San Franciscans, M0040, Dept. of Special Collections, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

bioghist.head: Biography
bioghist.p: Author and film writer. Associate editor of TIME and NEW YORKER (1927-1931). Born April 26, 1903 in New York.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Correspondence between Busch and Henry Simon of Simon and Schuster, Inc.; outline for a novel, A Love Story (later, THE SAN FRANCISCANS); original manuscript and final draft, both with corrections, of THE SAN FRANCISCANS.

did.unittitle: Typescript copy with manuscript corrections, original typescript outline of, correspondence relating to, and book reviews of the novel The San Franciscans.
Outline for a novel A Love Story.
Original manuscript with corrections of the novel The San Franciscans,
Final draft with corrections of the novel The San Franciscans,
Correspondence between Niven Busch and Henry Simon of Simon and Schuster, Inc. 1959 Apr. 21 - 1962 OCt. 3
